spatial_accuracy.notes: All rooms are present, and their adjacencies are preserved. Wall positions and corner angles appear accurate. Door in 'Utility' room is missing. All windows present and correctly placed. Overall scaling is consistent.

structural_fidelity.notes: Roof is completely removed, and all interior walls are visible. All structural elements match the plan. No additional rooms or architectural features are present. No text labels, measurement lines, or legends. Dark neutral background, model appears isolated, and no ground plane.

furniture_mapping.notes: All major furniture pieces, kitchen and bathroom fixtures are present and correctly placed in their respective rooms with appropriate scale. Some minor variations in furniture models from 2D to 3D, but overall accuracy is high.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Low-poly simplified forms are used, and surfaces are flat shaded with solid colors. Minimal textures are present on furniture like beds and rugs, which detracts slightly from the 'no textures' rule. Soft ambient lighting with minimal shadows. True isometric projection with 45° rotation, centered framing, and appropriate zoom level.

detected_errors.description: Missing door in the 'Utility' room in the 3D render.
Slight textures/patterns on some furniture (e.g., bed covers, rugs) instead of purely solid flat colors.

summary: The 3D render provides an excellent translation of the 2D floor plan with high spatial accuracy and structural fidelity, demonstrating strong adherence to geometric and visual compliance.
